resources.string: Beautiful DP and Status app contains beautiful pictures and videos for display picture(dp) and status. Beautiful DP and Status app is beautifully designed and developed by Pistalix. Pistalix develop all kind of software solutions. Pistalix also develops custom software solution according to customers requirements and affordable to their budget. For more details, you can visit at www.pistalix.in or contact us at info@pistalix.in
